definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Plant lectins are widely distributed in plant kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 植物凝集素广泛分布于植物界。

sentences.english: Preliminary results of studies on the specificity of a lectin from Trichosanthess were reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文对天花粉凝集素的糖结合特性，进行了初步研究。

sentences.english: In the venom of Trimeresurus stejnegeri exists a C type animal lectin.
sentences.chinese: 竹叶青蛇毒中存在一个C类动物凝集素。

sentences.english: Lectins were found in the fruit of Daucus carota L. (Wild carrot) and Apium L. (Celery).
sentences.chinese: 发现野胡萝卜果实与芹菜果实中有凝集素。

sentences.english: The results showed that PTL-channels werecation selective.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，半夏凝集素形成的通道为阳离子通道。

sentences.english: The leguminous lectin played an important role in the recognition of Rhizobia .
sentences.chinese: 豆科植物凝集素在对根瘤菌的识别中起重要作用。

sentences.english: Ammonium sulfate deposition were used to get kidney bean phytohemagglutinin.
sentences.chinese: 用硫酸铵沉淀法得到芸豆植物凝集素。

sentences.english: The lectin of cottons exist in their cotyledon and embryo.
sentences.chinese: 棉花凝集素贮存在种子子叶和胚中。

sentences.english: Rabbit red blood cells were most sensitive to lectins.
sentences.chinese: 兔血红细胞对各类凝集素最敏感。

sentences.english: C type lectin like proteins have lower structural similarity but distinct biological activities.
sentences.chinese: 型凝集素样蛋白的结构变异度大，活性亦具有多样性。

sentences.english: Objective To isolate and identify lectin-producing lactobacillus from sauerkraut juice.
sentences.chinese: 目的从泡菜汁中分离产凝集素乳杆菌并鉴定。
